title: What are some of the best split pushers/turret melters?
body:
I am tired of having 50-180 minute long games where my teammates are pathologically afraid of getting free gold from turrets and wonder why they still lose when three inhibitors fall down or why they can't shut down a 30/2 Nidalee but they have their precious KDA's to brag about, so I am going to take everyone's advice and start putting on my carry harder pants and take a break from ranked until I get some practice in on split pushing machines.

The meta shifted so much harder into objectives so I guess I need to get better at this game and learn some new champions to suit the meta better.

Edit because of necro: My money is on Quinn
